title: Compiler error: expected ‘)’ before ‘PRId64’
body_html:
I'm trying to install PyTorch from source (for MPI use) but I keep getting the following error when I try to run $python setup.py install
but I get the following error. I am using g++ 5.3.0 and Linux.

PyTorch GitHub In file included from generic/THCTensor.c:1:0,
                 from /work/home/staff/username/dev/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCGenerateAllTypes.h:23,
                 from /work/home/staff/username/dev/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCTensor.cpp:7:
/work/home/staff/username/dev/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensor.c: In function ‘THCDescBuff THCudaTensor_sizeDesc(THCState*, const THCudaTensor*)’:
/work/home/staff/username/dev/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensor.c:1020:35: error: expected ‘)’ before ‘PRId64’
     n += snprintf(str+n, L-n, "%" PRId64, tensor->size[i]);

Issue 3571 seems similar but affected a different directory.
Thanks in advance
body:
I'm trying to install PyTorch from source (for MPI use) but I keep getting the following error when I try to run  ` $python setup.py install`
but I get the following error. I am using g++ 5.3.0 and Linux.

```bash
PyTorch GitHub In file included from generic/THCTensor.c:1:0,
                 from /work/home/staff/username/dev/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCGenerateAllTypes.h:23,
                 from /work/home/staff/username/dev/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCTensor.cpp:7:
/work/home/staff/username/dev/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensor.c: In function ‘THCDescBuff THCudaTensor_sizeDesc(THCState*, const THCudaTensor*)’:
/work/home/staff/username/dev/pytorch/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensor.c:1020:35: error: expected ‘)’ before ‘PRId64’
     n += snprintf(str+n, L-n, "%" PRId64, tensor->size[i]);
```

Issue [3571](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3571) seems similar but affected a different directory.
Thanks in advance
